title: Definitions
context: ยง15-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Absentee ballot&rdquo; means a ballot as defined in section 11-1 used in absentee voting. &ldquo;Absentee polling place&rdquo; means an office or other suitable facility designated by the respective clerks for the conduct of absentee voting and the processing of absentee ballots. &ldquo;Electronic transmission&rdquo; means the transmission of a blank or voted ballot by facsimile, electronic mail delivery, or the utilization of an online absentee ballot delivery and return system that may include the ability to mark the ballot. &ldquo;Invalid ballot&rdquo; means any absentee ballot which does not meet the requirements for a ballot to be counted as listed in section 15-9. &ldquo;Voter in a remote area&rdquo; means any registered voter who resides ten miles or more from the voter&rsquo;s designated polling place by the most direct route for public travel.
